metadata.name: WEB3OG
metadata.description:
This is the first NFT minted by LADOB Gallery, a digital art gallery established in 2022 in Rio de Janeiro.

The artist behind this one is Marcus Menezes a.k.a. MPC, a.k.a Digitaldubs, creator of CryptoRastas, and founder of LADOB. 
The artwork entitled "WEB3OG" is a geometric-typographical - representation of the "web3" - the new internet paradigma based on the blockchain - with repeated minimalist shapes/lines and vibrant colors, inspired by Bauhaus, Brazilian Constructivism, Pop Art, and Crypto Art.
